title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: Emre Can (Turkish pronunciation: [ˈemɾe ˈdʒan]; born 12 January 1994) is a German professional footballer who plays for Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund, which he captains, and the Germany national team.

title: Emre Can
snippet: Emre Can has been at Borussia Dortmund since January 2020. In his time at the club, he has played as a full-back, number six, in the double pivot and in the eight, and most recently established himself in central defence. “Versatility is both a blessing and a curse,” he told the club’s ...
